Prerequisite: Fighter, ranger, or warlord; proficiency with any one-handed hammer or any one-handed pick.

Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Perception checks.

When you are attacking with a one-handed hammer or a one-handed pick and you have proficiency with that weapon, you also gain the following benefit.

When you attack an enemy with a power associated with this feat, you can target the enemy's Reflex instead of AC.

Associated Powers:

Brash Assault

,

Slash and Pummel

,

Throw and Stab

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 114.
